info.name: Reddit Cleaned
info.description: A redesigned version of Reddit, a clean one.
info.additionalInfo: For this style to work you have to: - have an account on reddit and be logged in - disable subreddits' custom styling (option available in your preferences) - disable RES' custom styling If you want to get Open Sans, a cleaner font, as the default font, you can try it by pasting this: @import url(http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:400,600,300); ...just at the second, blank line.
